feed.title: Algebra & Combinatorics Reading Group
feed.subtitle: The homepage for the reading group for the Algebra & Combinatorics research group at the University of Galway.

entry.title: Random $p$-adic Matrices
entry.content:
We are reading texts on the theory of random $p$-adic matrices and Cohen–Lenstra heuristics. Our sources are

  • Topics in random matrix theory by Terence Tao
  • An Introduction to Random Matrices by Greg W. Anderson, Alice Guionnet, and Ofer Zeitouni
  • Probability theory for random groups arising in number theory by Melanie Matchett Wood
  • Heuristics on class groups of number fields by Henri Cohen and Hendrik W. Lenstra Jr.
  • Universality of cokernels of random matrix products by Hoi H. Nguyen and Roger Van Peski
  • Random integral matrices and the Cohen–Lenstra heuristics by Melanie Matchett Wood

We meet on ? at ?. Contact Joshua Maglione if you are interested in joining.

Date Reading
  Section 1.1 (Tao)
entry.summary: We are reading texts on the theory of random $p$-adic matrices and Cohen–Lenstra heuristics. Our sources are Topics in random matrix theory by Terence Tao An Introduction to Random Matrices by Greg W. Anderson, Alice Guionnet, and Ofer Zeitouni Probability theory for random groups arising in number theory by Melanie Matchett Wood Heuristics on class groups of number fields by Henri Cohen and Hendrik W. Lenstra Jr. Universality of cokernels of random matrix products by Hoi H. Nguyen and Roger Van Peski Random integral matrices and the Cohen–Lenstra heuristics by Melanie Matchett Wood

entry.title: Theory of Species of Structures
entry.content:
We are reading texts on the theory of species of structures. Our sources are

  • Introduction to the Theory of Species of Structures by François Bergeron, Gilbert Labelle, and Pierre Leroux
  • A species approach to Rota’s twelvefold way by Anders Claesson
  • An Introduction to $q$-Species by Kent E. Morrison

We meet on Wednesday at 2:00pm. Contact Joshua Maglione if you are interested in joining.

Date Reading
10 Sep Vote
17 Sep Section 1.1 (BLL)
24 Sep Section 1.2 (BLL)
01 Oct Section 2.1 (BLL)
08 Oct Prop 2.10 → Section 2.2 (BLL)
15 Oct Section 2.2 (BLL)
22 Oct Section 2.3 (BLL)
29 Oct Section 2.4 (BLL)
05 Nov Section 3.1 (BLL)
12 Nov Section 3.2 (BLL)
19 Nov Twelvefold way
26 Nov $q$-Species
entry.summary: We are reading texts on the theory of species of structures. Our sources are Introduction to the Theory of Species of Structures by François Bergeron, Gilbert Labelle, and Pierre Leroux A species approach to Rota’s twelvefold way by Anders Claesson An Introduction to $q$-Species by Kent E. Morrison

entry.title: Schubert Geometry and Combinatorics
entry.content:
We are reading texts on Schubert geometry and combinatorics. Our first source is

  • Schubert Geometry and Combinatorics by Alexander Woo and Alexander Yong

We meet on Fridays at 1:00pm. Contact Joshua Maglione if you are interested in joining.

Date Reading
24 Jan canceled due to storm

07 Feb pp. 7 – 13 (WY)
14 Feb pp. 12 – 15 (WY)
21 Feb Section 4 (WY)
28 Feb pp. 18 – 21 (WY)
07 Mar pp. 21 – 26 (WY)
14 Mar canceled
21 Mar Ex. 5.34 & Section 5 (WY)
28 Mar Ex. 5.34 & Section 6 (WY)
04 Apr Section 7 (WY)
entry.summary: We are reading texts on Schubert geometry and combinatorics. Our first source is Schubert Geometry and Combinatorics by Alexander Woo and Alexander Yong

entry.title: Hopf Algebras in Combinatorics
entry.content:
We are reading texts on Hopf algebras in combinatorics. Our primary source is

  • Hopf Algebras in Combinatorics by Darij Grinberg and Victor Reiner

We meet on Thursdays at 11:00am. Contact Joshua Maglione if you are interested in joining.

Date Reading

31 Oct Sec. 3 (GR)
07 Mar Sec. 4.1–4.4 (GR)
14 Mar Sec. 4.5–4.9 (GR)
21 Mar Sec. 5 (GR)
28 Mar Sec. 8 (GR)
entry.summary: We are reading texts on Hopf algebras in combinatorics. Our primary source is Hopf Algebras in Combinatorics by Darij Grinberg and Victor Reiner

entry.title: Combinatorial Hodge Theory
entry.content:
We are reading texts that cover the somewhat new field of combinatorial Hodge theory. Our primary sources are

  • Combinatorics and Hodge Theory by June Huh,
  • Hodge theory for matroids by Joshua Wang

We meet on Fridays at 1:00pm. Contact Joshua Maglione if you are interested in joining.

Date Reading
12 Jan Voted
19 Jan pp. 212–218 Huh
26 Jan pp. 217–222 Huh
02 Feb Section 2 Huh
09 Feb Sections 1 & 2 Wang
16 Feb pp. 12–16 Wang
23 Feb pp. 12–16 Wang
01 Mar pp. 15–22 Wang
08 Mar pp. 18–22 Wang
15 Mar Sections 3.2 & 4.1 Wang
22 Mar Sections 4.2 & 4.3 Wang
29 Mar Canceled
entry.summary: We are reading texts that cover the somewhat new field of combinatorial Hodge theory. Our primary sources are Combinatorics and Hodge Theory by June Huh, Hodge theory for matroids by Joshua Wang

entry.title: Combinatorial Commutative Algebra
entry.content: We are reading the first chapter of Richard P. Stanley’s Combinatorics and Commutative Algebra book.
entry.summary: We are reading the first chapter of Richard P. Stanley’s Combinatorics and Commutative Algebra book.
